segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: A

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: I work on Saturdays and in the school holidays.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: Saturdays are busy because that's when everyone goes shopping.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: Our shop sells clothes and accessories for men, women and children.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: I work in the children's department.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: It can be crazy sometimes, but it's fun.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: B.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I work during my summer holidays when I'm not at university.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: Oxford has thousands of tourists in the summer, so it's easy to find a job as a tour guide.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I take tourists to visit the university colleges and then we go down to the river.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: We go along the river on a boat.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: The tourists love the boat trip.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: But last summer, Huang tourists fell in the river.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I love meeting people from all over the world.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: C.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I like my job.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: But lots of people don't like coming to see me because...

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: They hate dentists.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: Sometimes it's very hard work.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: But it's great to help people when they have a problem.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: It's so important to look after your teeth.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: D.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: My job is very difficult, but I like it because I love flying. I fly planes that take people to different places on holiday. Most of the time I fly in Europe to places like Spain, Greece and Italy. The most difficult thing about my job is when the weather is bad. Snow and thunderstorms are the worst. The best thing is visiting different places.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: E.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I work in a hospital in the city centre.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: It's a very big hospital.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I help the doctors with the patients.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I give them their medicine and look after them when they feel ill.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I love my job.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: But.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: I don't like the uniform.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: and sometimes I have to work at night.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: This recording was brought to you by the British Council.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: To find others like it...

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: Visit.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: www.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: British Council.

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: dot org

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: forward slash

segments.speaker: Interviewee
segments.text: Learn English Teens.
